com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.task

Class RhnQueueJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.taskomatic.task.RhnQueueJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RhnJob, org.quartz.Job
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelRepodata, ErrataCacheTask, ErrataQueue

    public abstract class RhnQueueJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements RhnJob
    Custom Quartz Job implementation which only allows one thread to run at a time. All other threads return without performing any work. This policy was chosen instead of blocking so as to reduce threading problems inside Quartz itself.
